name: Press E to Forget
description:
This is a first-person exploration game where after a night of heavy drinking, you find yourself in a bad situation...

  • Look for places to throw up
  • Interact with objects (and pets!)
  • Witness unspeakable horrors
Created for #WineJam 2018

Credits:

Designed/Directed by Toby Do

Gameplay Programming/Vomit Effects by Arjuna "SuperArjunaButt" Gonzalez

Music by Ryan Yoshikami

P.S. Special thanks to Nina Freeman and Josh Squires for hosting the jam!!
